txt.en: The troll, Ora, stomps about the forest's edge outside Eastfold to the east of Edoras.

Ora can be found just inside the forest near Eastfold, far to the east of Edoras.\n\nYou have encountered a monstrous troll amid the forest outside Eastfold. You should defeat him before he can move any closer to Edoras.
You have defeated Ora and his handlers.
You have defeated Ora, putting an end to the troll's violent rampage throughout the Westemnet. The people of Eastfold and Kingstead will be glad to see such a creature gone from their lands.
A brutal troll of the White Hand lurks near the edge of Eastfold, crushing all of those that stray too far from the road.

While wandering near the border of the Eastfold, you have encountered a monstrously large troll roaming the forest. You should defeat the troll, Ora, before his handlers can direct his wrath at Aldburg or Edoras.
Ora still roams near the forest's edge. You should defeat him.
